name: Shrey Healthcare
overview:
Established in the year 2001, we, “Shrey Healthcare” is a distinguished firm involved in manufacturing and supplying Willians Cough Drop Candy, Coolers Throat Drop Candy, Tasty Hazam Digestive Candy, Pan Maaza Throat Drop Candy, Tasty Orange Digestive Candy, Tasty Lemon Digestive Candy and Tasty Lichee Digestive Candy. All our products are prepared using excellent quality ingredients, mostly extracts are acquired from authentic vendors.

Our Products: Throat Candy Digestive Ayurvedic Candy Ayurvedic HL Candy

Our Team: We are supported by a competent team of professionals strives to achieve the best of their potential on the path to success. Our efficient force of focused personnel helps us to cater to the different needs of our of our clients. We take pride in presenting our explicit workforce from the top level management to the floor level personnel who work together with a common goal towards the growth of our organization.

Quality: Our organizations’ prime objective is to provide our customers with a flawless range of quality products. All our products are made in adherence to the international quality norms. Moreover, our team of quality auditors ensure that are products are made with the best-in-quality raw material.

Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility, which enables us in carrying out all our activities in a speedy manner. At our organization, we have the latest technologies installed with advanced machinery to provide consistent productivity even in case of bulk production.
